attributes.action: Changing council tax rules without a parliamentary decision.
attributes.background: Stratford district council have ordered unemployed, disabled and sick to pay 20% council tax after the government pay what they say you need to live on the district council are reducing the benefit by the back door making the void between the have and have nots greater.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
